tailwindVersion.description: The tailwind version that is used (default ^1.1.4).

customWebpackVersion.description: The custom webpack builder version that is used (default ^8.4.0).

styleExtension.description: Fallback configuration if styles extension can't be determined. Is automatically detected based on your styles.css file. (css|scss).

overwrite.description: Shall we overwrite already existing tailwind configuration files? (default false)
